elements.title: Rockstar North (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that in 1989, Rockstar North opened its first offices above a former fish and chip shop (pictured) in Dundee?

elements.title: Laquintasaura (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the discovery of Laquintasaura challenged the idea that early dinosaurs could not survive in equatorial regions?

elements.title: Yerevan Children's Art Museum (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Yerevan Children's Art Museum deliberately kept no records from the 1970s to the 1990s?

elements.title: Sam Carling (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Sam Carling is the first UK member of Parliament to be born in the 21st century?

elements.title: an Idaho TV station (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that an Idaho TV station lost its network affiliation after less than two years on the air but did not permanently close for another decade?

elements.title: wear shorter nails on their middle and index fingers (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that some LGBT people wear shorter nails on their middle and index fingers to allow for easier manual sex and to express a queer identity?

elements.title: Eilish Cleary (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Eilish Cleary was controversially dismissed as New Brunswick's chief medical officer of health while studying glyphosate, a herbicide widely used in the province's industries?

elements.title: in 1683 ice floes on the River Trent (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that in 1683 ice floes on the River Trent in England badly damaged the bridges at Nottingham and Newark?

elements.title: superseded combination (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that a superseded combination is not a synonym for a synonym?
